memberdef.name: LogChanges
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (LogComponents[COMPONENT_LOG].comp_log_type != TESTLOG || \ LogComponents[COMPONENT_LOG].comp_log_level == NIV_FULL_DEBUG) \ DisplayLogComponentLevel(COMPONENT_LOG, NIV_NULL, "LOG: " format, ## args ); \ } while (0)

memberdef.name: VA_ARG_ERREUR_T
memberdef.initializer: numero = va_arg( arguments, long ) ; label = va_arg( arguments, char * ) ; msg = va_arg( arguments, char *)

memberdef.argsstring: (log_components_t component, int level, char *format, va_list arguments)
